attributes.action: Make latin compulsory in all schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Latin will help children immensly. As well as giving them a grasp of where our language came from it helps with grammer and increases accuracy. It will also help with the sytudy of other european languages. The subject also explores a vital and fasinating part of History.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
